title: SP5 "Episode of Nami: Tears of a Navigator and the Bonds of Friends"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Nami: Kōkaishi no Namida to Nakama no Kizuna" (Japanese:エピソードオブナミ ～航海士の涙と仲間の絆～) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka August 25, 2012(2012-08-25) 106 minutes
transformers_text:
SP5 "Episode of Nami: Tears of a Navigator and the Bonds of Friends"[4]Transliteration: "Episōdo obu Nami: Kōkaishi no Namida to Nakama no Kizuna" (Japanese:エピソードオブナミ ～航海士の涙と仲間の絆～) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka August 25, 2012(2012-08-25) 106 minutes

An abridged remake of the Arlong Park story arc:[n 2]Some time after joining the Straw Hats, Nami steals the Going Merry and returns to her home inCocoyashi Village, which is under the control of theArlong Pirates. When Usopp finds Nami,Arlongorders her to kill him, and she injures herself while faking Usopp's death. Once the Straw Hats regroup, Nami's sisterNojiko, aware of the bond they had, explains that when Arlong took control of the village, he murdered Nami's mother and held Cocoyashi's citizens as ransom to exploit Nami's exceptional talent for cartography. After Arlong informsNezumi, a bribed Marine, of where Nami's earnings are hidden, the village riots against Arlong despite poor odds. After Nami tearfully asks Luffy for help, he and the remaining Straw Hats free the village by fighting and defeating the Arlong Pirates. After a days-long celebration, Nami re-joins the Straw Hat crew.
